name: ADR-Labelling Game
description: ADR-Labelling teaches the players the basics of markings dangerous goods transport vehicles. Players can either place the markings on pre-made cargo or load the vehicles themselves. Once the cargo has been selected player is tasked to place all the correct orange plates and ADR labels on the vehicle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or greater Processor: Intel Core Duo 2.0 GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 3600+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GT430 or AMD HD5450 or Intel HD4000 with 1GB of VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 256 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
